"A six foot long claw-foot tub used for bathing. The back of the tub is slanted at a slight incline to recline upon as you soak away your troubles in it's steaming water. The hot water is filled and emptied via the maids that strenuously bucket water up the stairs. The tub itself has a depth of approximately 2 feet, while the sturdy, claw like feet add an additional three inches to the piece's overall height. This tub looks just big enough to comfortably hold one person, possibly two, in a tight fit."
